name: ZERO BARS
description:
WHERE AM I?!

You suddenly wake up in the middle nowhere and have no idea where you are or how you got there. Luckily you still have your phone but no signal. All you can do now is find a place with strong enough signal to call your mom but you better hurry up before you run out of battery!


Credits:

Programming:

  • Jordi Mahyudin
  • Neo Meurs

Graphics:

  • Sandra Caraan
  • Kayla Roeten

Music and Sound Effects:

  • Cassius Harju

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Right click to use flashlight
  • Mouse to look
  • Mouse to navigate menus

This game was created in 3 days for the International Educations Game Jam 2022

Known bugs:

-  Esc doesn't work 
- Mouse cursor not visible(Something to do with First Person Player Movement)
